OOC: Let's count this as before my last post.

BIC:  Sunhawk's left hand (ever noticed how much
damage I take on the left) is severly damaged and
ceases working, but with his right he puts Megatron in
a headlock.

--- Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote:
> 
>  dnt you mean preds
>   x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote: ooC: Ok.
> 
> To everyone else who has a decepticon, Megatron says
> HELP! =P
> 
> -- Megatron --
> 
> Megatron growls, "You are wasting my time Maximal,"
> He shifts his 
> energon axe over slightly, and deflects Sunhawk's
> sword blade. Using 
> a bit of the momentum of Sunhawk's dive, he spins,
> slashing downward 
> at Sunhawk's side.
> 
> He spots Warhead's form in the corner of his optics,
> and starts 
> formulating a plan to get him, and Warhead out of
> here as quickly as 
> possible, cause he was outnumbered, and out gunned,
> though likely 
> not by much.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > Sunhawk realizes that close-range combat it
> useless. 
> > He returns fire as Megatron transforms, but sees
> the
> > incoming blast.
> > 
> > Sunhawk:  BEAST MODE!
> > 
> > He goes to hawk mode and is barely able to dodge
> > around the blast.  He circles around and comes in
> from
> > behind hoping that in robot mode close range
> combat
> > will be easier.  At the last second he transforms
> back
> > and comes in with his energon sword.
> > 
>
